The Obama Administration has implemented more than $95 Billion in new regulations to business and industry since becoming President.

321,000 manufacturing jobs have been lost since Obama became President.
The cost of The President's community college tuition plan over 10 years is $60 Billion.
Increase in debt per capita for Americans since President Obama took office: $21,724.  #SOTU.

$1.3 trillion in total student debt held by Americans under President Obama.
Cost of Obamacare's coverage provisions through 2024: $1.8 Trillion.
Median household income has declined by $2,484 since President Obama took office. #SOTU.
46.5 million Americans now receive food stamps under this President, a record number.
Total debt under President Obama has increased more than $8 trillion.
